CustomField.description: NICC-024063 ***THIS FIELD IS DISPLAYED IN THE PARTNER COMMUNITY*** Originally created to display the account number of the account record related to the Subscription Activation record to Partner Community users. This allows the Partner Community users to see the Account Number without giving them access to the Account object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Account Number of the account related to this subscription activation record
CustomField.label: Account Number
